name: Rescue Dead Town Zombie
description:
Rescue Dead Town Zombie provides you a great platform to earn the title of real zombie hunting machine. You are in a city full of dead people; you need to be very careful in this unskilled zombie highway war game. One wrong turn can flip this whole monster killing plan in hunting and zombie shooter simulator. Be the funny zombie hunter in this zombie trigger shooter game.
Features:
Escape & kill brain dead enemies in best sniper game!
Shoot down furious monster as real escape sniper shooter!
Rescue city survivors from homecoming zombies!
Thrilling action packed fps game of 2017!
Devise perfect zombie escape survival strategy!
High quality 3d graphics, animations & best sound effects!
